2000-01-01 00:00:00+00:00 [NOTICE] This is notice level 
2000-01-01 00:00:00+00:00 [ERROR ] This is error level 
2000-01-01 00:00:00+00:00 [NOTICE] This is indent=1 notice level With extra message filed 
2000-01-01 00:00:00+00:00 [ERROR ] This is indent=1 error level With extra message filed 
2000-01-01 00:00:00+00:00 [NOTICE] This is indent=2 notice level With extra message filed 
2000-01-01 00:00:00+00:00 [ERROR ] This is indent=2 error level With extra message filed 
2000-01-01 00:00:00+00:00 [NOTICE] This is indent=3 notice level With extra message filed 
2000-01-01 00:00:00+00:00 [ERROR ] This is indent=3 error level With extra message filed 
2000-01-01 00:00:00+00:00 [NOTICE] This is indent=reset notice level With extra message filed 
2000-01-01 00:00:00+00:00 [ERROR ] This is indent=reset error level With extra message filed 
2000-01-01 00:00:00+00:00 [NOTICE] This is indent=1 notice level With extra message filed 
2000-01-01 00:00:00+00:00 [ERROR ] This is indent=1 error level With extra message filed 
2000-01-01 00:00:00+00:00 [NOTICE] This is indent=5 notice level With extra message filed 
2000-01-01 00:00:00+00:00 [ERROR ] This is indent=5 error level With extra message filed
